original_text: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.
korean_text: 네 존귀를 그에게 돌려 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중을 그에게 복종하게 하라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그에게 네 영광의 일부를 부여할지니라

sentences.original_text: that all the congregation of the children of Israel
